com.grapecity.documents.excel.examples.f:
//set workbook's reference style to R1C1. exported xlsx file will be R1C1 style.
        workbook.setReferenceStyle(ReferenceStyle.R1C1);
workbook.open(getResourceStream("xlsx/Signature.xlsx"));

//Create empty workbook, contains one worksheet default.
    	workbook = new Workbook();
workbook.open(this.getResourceStream("xlsx/Information.csv"), OpenFileFormat.Csv);

//Change the path to the real file path when open.
        workbook.open("source.xlsx");
workbook.open(getResourceStream("xlsx/OleTemplates.xlsx"));

//change the path to real export path when save.
        workbook.save("dest.xlsx");

IWorksheet worksheet = workbook.getWorksheets().get(0);
        worksheet.getRange("A2").getInterior().setColor(Color.GetGreen());
